name: The Fetching Family
description:
Gia Fetching is home from her first year in college, and she's exhausted! Unfortunately for her, her kooky cast of family members all have a different tasks for her to complete before they'll go to dinner. It's like the whole family is against her! What will happen in this funny game about family, poop jokes, and fetch quests?!

Made for the Funni Game Jam in 2 weeks. Probably some bugs here and there. Hopefully you can play through it all. If not, let me know!

Music:

"Swage" by dpren / Freesound
